    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Gradient.Key Gradient.Key.clone()

    Gradient.Key Gradient.findGe​(float step)
    Returns the least key in this gradient greater than or equal to the given step.
    Gradient.Key Gradient.findLe​(float step)
    Returns the greatest key in this gradient less than or equal to the given step.

    Retrieves the first key in this gradient.

    Removes the last key from the gradient.
